channel.title: Happy Birthday Garry!
channel.description:
Today (Or sometime this week)[/SIZE] It's Garry's birthday!
So happy birthday man.

item.title: Happy Birthday Garry!
item.dc:creator: Repzik
item.description:
sersoft:

Why would you hack your join date to a tragic event? To remind people that thousands have died when he joined the forums? I don’t have a better opinion on Garry because of that.

Terrible wording. I meant ‘better’ as in, you understand him better, not that you think better of him.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy Birthday Garry!
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
John Killer118:

I find it funny, how when there’s a good free mod (like MINERVA, or Black Mesa: Source) people will say “omg dis mod is great i wud pay moniez for dis!” But when you now CAN pay for the good mod (like Garry’s Mod 10 or the upcoming They Hunger), now everyone says “omg wtf you sell out!” No matter how low the price is.
So, you see, Garry Newman works hard on his mod. He deserves a little money every now and then. If Garry’s Mod was a full $50, then I would understand the pissy attitude. However, it’s only TEN DOLLARS! If Garry really wanted to piss in everyone’s face he would update his game once every year and charge for the updates, EA Sports style. Instead, it’s one easy payment of $10.

The Reverend:

Oh boo hoo! Someone is charging money for a program they developed and that should never happen. No one in the history of time should EVER be compensated, rewarded, or fornicated because of some hard work they put into something.

How dare you Garry Newman! You animal! You anti-christ! $10 for a program that you put countless hours into! I will see myself in Hell first before I ever compensate you for your hard work. In fact, I will continually bitch about it for the end of time despite the fact that my opinion and others of the like have no effect on you or your continued development of Gmod whatsoever. How dare you, you son of a bitch!

Quoted for ultimate truth.

Also Gary Numan rocks.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy Birthday Garry!
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
sersoft:

You must have been living under a rock then… Gmod used to be a free mod that allowed people who love hl2 to express their creativity or just fuck around, then garry shat in everyone’s face by making it cost money, now the remaining users of gmod are people with no life, and/or trolls and 99% of the users are “lucky” 12yr olds whose parents paid for garry’s mod.

I lol’d at how true it is, my brothers 13 and plays Garrys Mod way too much it’s sad.

Read full topic

item.title: Happy Birthday Garry!
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Repzik:

Here is a quick fact to give you a better opinion on Gary:

On his forums, facepunch, which I am not sure when they were created (but they have to have been made 2004-2006) Garry’s join date is September 11, 2001.

Why would you hack your join date to a tragic event? To remind people that thousands have died when he joined the forums? I don’t have a better opinion on Garry because of that.

Jambo:

I’m not saying it should, but I wouldn’t care if it did.

I would pay for it, but then uninstall and download it off a torrent just for good measure.

Read full topic

I’m not saying it should, but I wouldn’t care if it did.

sersoft:

Btw, thanks Jambo, for gifting me gmod. lol

=P
